Package com.here.sdk.routing

Class IsolineOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.sdk.routing.IsolineOptions
  • public final class IsolineOptions
extends java.lang.Object

    Specifies options for isolines calculation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  IsolineOptions.Calculation
      Specifies isoline parameters.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      IsolineOptions.Calculation calculationOptions
      Specifies isoline parameters.
      CarOptions carOptions
      Specifies options for calculation of isolines for car.
      EVCarOptions evCarOptions
      Specifies options for calculation of isolines for electric car.
      EVTruckOptions evTruckOptions
      Specifies options for calculation of isolines for electric truck.
      TruckOptions truckOptions
      Specifies options for calculation of isolines for truck.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      IsolineOptions​(IsolineOptions.Calculation calculationOptions, CarOptions carOptions)
      Constructs options to calculate isolines from destination or origin, with preferences for isoline calculation and car routing options.
      IsolineOptions​(IsolineOptions.Calculation calculationOptions, EVCarOptions evCarOptions)
      Constructs options to calculate isolines from destination or origin, with preferences for isoline calculation and electric car routing options.
      IsolineOptions​(IsolineOptions.Calculation calculationOptions, EVTruckOptions evTruckOptions)
      Constructs options to calculate isolines from destination or origin, with preferences for isoline calculation and electric truck routing options.
      IsolineOptions​(IsolineOptions.Calculation calculationOptions, TruckOptions truckOptions)
      Constructs options to calculate isolines from destination or origin, with preferences for isoline calculation and truck routing options.

    • Field Detail

      • calculationOptions

        @NonNull
public IsolineOptions.Calculation calculationOptions

        Specifies isoline parameters.

      • carOptions

        @Nullable
public CarOptions carOptions

        Specifies options for calculation of isolines for car. Mutually exclusive with truck_options, ev_car_options and ev_truck_options.

      • truckOptions

        @Nullable
public TruckOptions truckOptions

        Specifies options for calculation of isolines for truck. Mutually exclusive with car_options, ev_car_options and ev_truck_options.

      • evCarOptions

        @Nullable
public EVCarOptions evCarOptions

        Specifies options for calculation of isolines for electric car. Mutually exclusive with car_options, truck and ev_truck_options.

      • evTruckOptions

        @Nullable
public EVTruckOptions evTruckOptions

        Specifies options for calculation of isolines for electric truck. Mutually exclusive with car_options, truck_options and ev_car_options.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IsolineOptions

        public IsolineOptions​(@NonNull
                      IsolineOptions.Calculation calculationOptions,
                      @NonNull
                      CarOptions carOptions)

        Constructs options to calculate isolines from destination or origin, with preferences for isoline calculation and car routing options.

        Parameters:
        calculationOptions -

        The options to be used to calculate this isoline.

        carOptions -

        The options that should influence the possible routes within the isoline. This determines also the transportation type.

        Parameters:

        The options to be used to calculate this isoline.

        truckOptions -

        The options that should influence the possible routes within the isoline. This determines also the transportation type.
